metadata.synopsis: Occurs if the player clicks on the first mind flayer pod with someone inside. They can attempt to free the captive - Shadowheart - but the magical runes guarding the pod prevent this.The player can leave her stuck, or try to find another way to free her. Via a skillcheck or via Shadowheart herself, they may receive a clue to examine the console next to the pod.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game 2. goto -1.66, 17.62, -345.723. Interact with the pod.

17.speaker: Shadowheart
17.text: You! Get me out of this damn thing!
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Shadowheart is pounding from the inside of the pod. The pod itself is covered in strange lines of silver, unlike the other pods (this is qualith)NodeContext: Urgrent, angry and desperate. She's locked in a coffin-sized tube aboard a crashing spaceship. She tries to get the player to free her.

40.speaker: Shadowheart
40.text: You can't force it that way. Try something else, go look around - anything. Please!
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: The barbarian player grips the pod lid and grimaces as they're shocked again. They heave and yank the lid up. Sparks fly. The player stands back as shadowheart falls forward out of the pod.
